item.title: Hello World
item.author: contact@atishay.me (Atishay Jain)
item.description: The first output of every computer program has traditionally been hello world. That feels like the right way to restart a blog. I have had a website and blogs at multiple times in the past. While resurrecting a website and a blog for myself, I have had some questions that you non-blogger should ask yourself: Why blog? Why now? What has changed? Blogging is one of the corner stones of the wild west of the Internet.
